resources.string: "Couldn't pair with %1$s because of an incorrect PIN or passkey."
Touch and hold icons to rearrange quick settings

"Any changes that you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes that you make on the phone to the web. Your Google™ Account works this way.
To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts & sync."

"Any changes that you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes that you make on your device to the web.
To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts & sync.
Data charges may apply when updating your device. An unlimited data plan is recommended."
You can also open Quick settings by swiping down from the top to the centre of the screen
Allow the application %1$s to access the USB device?
Allow the application %1$s to access the USB accessory?
No installed applications work with this USB accessory. Learn more about this accessory at %1$s
"The user currently signed in to this device can't turn on USB debugging. To use this feature, switch to the primary user “%s”."
Install Android File Transfer application for Mac

"Because your set data limit was reached, the device has paused data usage for the remainder of this cycle.
Resuming may lead to charges from your provider."
You won’t be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except from alarms, reminders, events and callers that you specify.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos and games. You’ll still be able to make phone calls.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos and games.
Total silence. This will also silence screen readers.

"When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users."
"%s will start capturing everything that's displayed on your screen."

"Your device is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device and your device's location information. For more information, contact your administrator."

"You gave an app permission to set up a VPN connection.
This app can monitor your device and network activity, including emails, apps and websites."

"Your device is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device and your device's location information.
You're connected to a VPN, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator is capable of monitoring your network activity including emails, apps and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator.
You're also connected to a VPN, which can monitor your network activity."
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity including emails, apps and websites."
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your personal network activity, including emails, apps and websites."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s. It is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s. It is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
You're also connected to %3$s, which can monitor your personal network activity."

"Your device is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device, and your device's location information.
You're connected to %2$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator."
Device will stay locked until you manually unlock it

"Screen pinning locks the display in a single view. You cannot receive any incoming calls and a third party cannot search your location until you have unpinned. Also, some apps may not work and notifications may not appear properly. To unpin, touch and hold ◁ (Back key) and □ (Recent apps key) at the same time."

"Screen pinning locks the display in a single view. You cannot receive any incoming calls, and a third party cannot search your location until you have unpinned. Also, some apps may not work and notifications may not appear properly. To unpin, touch and hold the Back key and Recent apps key at the same time."
%1$s wants to be the volume dialogue.
"You won't hear your next alarm %1$s unless you turn this off before then"
System UI Tuner gives you extra ways to tweak and customise the Android user interface. These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
Remove System UI Tuner from Settings and stop using all of its features?
"Your SIM card has been permanently disabled. Contact your wireless service provider for another SIM card."
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code or contact your mobile network operator for more information.
SIM \"%1$s\" is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. Contact operator for details.
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers long.
PUK code should be 8 digits long.
You have attempted to unlock the phone %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, the phone will be reset to factory default and all user data will be lost.
You have entered an incorrect code %d times. The phone will now be reset to factory default.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, this user will be removed, which will delete all user data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. This user will be removed, which will delete all user data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, the work profile will be removed, which will delete all profile data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. The work profile will be removed, which will delete all profile data.
Incorrect SIM PIN code. Enter PUK code or contact your mobile network operator for more information.
SIM is disabled. Please contact your mobile network operator.
Do not remove the SD card while it is disconnecting

"You have entered an incorrect password, PIN or pattern %1$d times. You have %2$d more attempts before the device will be factory-reset.
To continue safely, please enter the following:"

Your last attempt to enter a PIN has locked this SIM card. Please contact your wireless service provider to get your PUK code to unlock your SIM card. Press Continue to enter the PUK to unlock your SIM card.
